video.title: The Secret Circle
video.synopsis: This supernatural drama series centers around a shy 16-year-old who discovers, after moving to a new town, that she comes from a long line of witches.

episodes.synopsis: Britt Robertson stars as Cassie in the series premiere of this thrilling new drama about a secret circle of friends with extraordinary powers.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Cassie attempts to have a life without witchcraft but Diana has different plans. Adam fights his growing feelings for Cassie.
episodes.title: Bound

episodes.synopsis: Adam is jealous when Cassie brings a date to the school dance. Meanwhile, Melissa sees the dance as an opportunity to get closer to Nick.
episodes.title: Loner

episodes.synopsis: Cassie discovers a friend of her mother's, Heather Barnes, has been catatonic since the night of the fire 16 years ago and wants to use magic to help.
episodes.title: Heather

episodes.synopsis: Cassie is torn between her grandmother and the Circle. Nick is surprised when Melissa enlists his help to find her family's Book of Shadows.
episodes.title: Slither

episodes.synopsis: Faye plots revenge when an ex-boyfriend, Jake, returns to Chance Harbor. To complicate things further, Jake sets his sights on the alluring Cassie.
episodes.title: Wake

episodes.synopsis: Faye convinces Cassie to throw a big Halloween party, but it takes a dangerous turn. After a fight with Diana, Adam turns to Cassie for advice.
episodes.title: Masked

episodes.synopsis: Worried after not hearing from her grandmother, Cassie wants to go look for her. Diana decides the entire Circle should go and invites Jake along too.
episodes.title: Beneath

episodes.synopsis: Adam is protective of Cassie when Faye reveals that Jake might be hiding something dangerous from them. Melissa's cousin Holden catches Diana's eye.
episodes.title: Balcoin

episodes.synopsis: Cassie reveals a secret to Adam. Faye recruits a mysterious stranger, Lee, to help her with a spell.
episodes.title: Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Adam asks Cassie to the Fire and Ice dance. Faye asks Lee to help her with a spell that would grant her individual magic.
episodes.title: Fire/Ice

episodes.synopsis: Jake returns and offers Cassie the chance to find out what happened 16 years ago. Charles and Dawn try to get Ethan on board as an ally.
episodes.title: Witness

episodes.synopsis: Cassie enlists the Circle's help after she gets a warning about the witch hunters' return. Plus, her true feelings for Adam and Jake surface.
episodes.title: Medallion

episodes.synopsis: Valentine's Day brings slumber parties, surprise hookups and vengeful witches. After some mood-altering "Devil's Spirit," Diana loosens up around Lee.
episodes.title: Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Cassie storms off when an evil figure from her past shows up and is captured by Eben and his band of witch hunters.
episodes.title: Return

episodes.synopsis: Cassie catches Blackwell sneaking around. Faye shows up at Lee's house and gets a surprise. Diana checks out a new guy in town.
episodes.title: Lucky

episodes.synopsis: Cassie and Adam visit Cassie's grandmother, Jane, to find out if there is a spell to reverse the curse on their love. Eva starts stalking Faye.
episodes.title: Curse

episodes.synopsis: A witch hunter has a message for Blackwell. Faye and Melissa help out Adam at the Boathouse in return for magic to enhance their love lives.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Jake, Cassie and Faye seek out Jake's grandfather's family crystal and are confronted with disturbing theories about the events of 16 years ago.
episodes.title: Crystal

episodes.synopsis: Jake calls for a meeting with Isaac to see if they can get him to change sides. The Circle does magic to find the remaining crystals.
episodes.title: Traitor

episodes.synopsis: Adam, Diana, Cassie and Melissa make it to Prom, but when they lose a crystal to Eben they end up in a life and death situation.
episodes.title: Prom

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Cassie and Diana unleash their dark magic, Charles and Dawn get a shot at restoring their powers and Faye fights for her life.
episodes.title: Family
